content: The Thunderstone can be found in the largest Pagoda at New Thunderclap Temple in The New West. From the Temple Entrance, head all the way up the first flight of stairs until you see a building on your right. The Curios is sat behind a statue in a box.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Thunderstone.md', within the main section titled 'Thunderstone', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Thunderstone Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Thunderstone can be found in the largest Pagoda at New Thunderclap Temple in The New West. From the Temple Entrance, head all the way up the first flight of stairs until you see a building on your right. The Curios is sat behind a statue in a box.
